clinical_notes.subjective: 58-year-old patient with Type 2 diabetes for 5 years. Reports good blood sugar control with metformin. No symptoms of hyperglycemia. Regular exercise and diet compliance. Annual check-up.
clinical_notes.objective: Vital signs: BP 130/85, HR 72, Weight 85kg, BMI 28. Blood glucose 7.2 mmol/L. No diabetic complications on examination. Feet examination normal.
clinical_notes.plan: Continue metformin. Annual HbA1c and comprehensive diabetic screening. Lifestyle counseling. Follow-up in 3 months.

appointments.referral_to: Labor München - HbA1c and diabetic screening

clinical_notes.subjective: Blood draw for annual diabetic screening including HbA1c, lipid profile, kidney function, and microalbuminuria.
clinical_notes.objective: HbA1c: 6.8% (good control), Total cholesterol: 4.2 mmol/L, LDL: 2.8 mmol/L, HDL: 1.1 mmol/L, Triglycerides: 1.5 mmol/L, Creatinine: 88 μmol/L, eGFR: 85 mL/min/1.73m², Microalbuminuria: 15 mg/L (normal)
clinical_notes.plan: Continue current management. Results sent to primary care physician.

appointments.referral_to: Dr. med. Andreas Weber - lab results

clinical_notes.subjective: Patient reports good blood sugar control. No symptoms of hyperglycemia. Regular exercise (walking 30 minutes daily). Diet compliance good. Weight stable.
clinical_notes.objective: Vital signs: BP 128/82, Weight 84kg, BMI 27.8. Blood glucose 6.8 mmol/L. No diabetic complications. Feet examination normal.
clinical_notes.plan: Continue metformin. Lifestyle counseling reinforced. Follow-up in 3 months.

clinical_notes.subjective: Patient reports excellent blood sugar control. No symptoms. Regular exercise maintained. Diet compliance excellent. Weight loss of 2kg.
clinical_notes.objective: Vital signs: BP 125/80, Weight 82kg, BMI 27.2. Blood glucose 6.5 mmol/L. No diabetic complications. Feet examination normal.
clinical_notes.plan: Continue metformin. Lifestyle counseling. Follow-up in 3 months.

clinical_notes.subjective: Patient reports continued excellent blood sugar control. No symptoms. Regular exercise maintained. Diet compliance excellent. Weight stable.
clinical_notes.objective: Vital signs: BP 122/78, Weight 82kg, BMI 27.2. Blood glucose 6.3 mmol/L. No diabetic complications. Feet examination normal.
clinical_notes.plan: Continue metformin. Lifestyle counseling. Annual comprehensive screening in 3 months.

clinical_notes.subjective: Patient reports excellent blood sugar control throughout the year. No symptoms. Regular exercise maintained. Diet compliance excellent. Very satisfied with diabetes management.
clinical_notes.objective: Vital signs: BP 120/75, Weight 81kg, BMI 27.0. Blood glucose 6.1 mmol/L. No diabetic complications. Feet examination normal.
clinical_notes.assessment: Type 2 diabetes mellitus, excellent long-term control
clinical_notes.plan: Continue metformin. Lifestyle counseling. Annual screening completed. Follow-up in 3 months.

doctor_comments.content: Annual diabetic screening shows excellent control. HbA1c 6.8% indicates good long-term glucose control. Lipid profile within target ranges. Kidney function normal with no microalbuminuria. No diabetic complications detected. Patient demonstrates excellent compliance with diabetes management.

Excellent progress in diabetes management. Patient has achieved 2kg weight loss through lifestyle modifications. Blood glucose control improved from 7.2 to 6.5 mmol/L. Blood pressure also improved. This demonstrates the effectiveness of patient education and lifestyle counseling in diabetes management. Patient highly motivated and compliant.

Outstanding diabetes management over the past year. Patient has maintained excellent blood glucose control with HbA1c consistently below 7%. Weight loss of 4kg achieved through lifestyle modifications. No diabetic complications developed. Blood pressure improved. This case demonstrates the importance of regular monitoring and patient education in diabetes care. Patient serves as an excellent example of successful diabetes self-management.
